title: Rainbows and Roses
description: Life is random and so is this book. It is a collection of poems arranged in no particular order. There are happy poems, sad poems, serious poems, poems about real life and poems that are total fiction. There are poems about love, poems about cats, poems for children, and there is even one about a... From one page to the next you don't know what you are going to find.Come with meand climb a rainbowone colour at a timeuntil we reach the clouds.We can drift awaywith the billowing greyon a quest to catcha wandering star.And on that starwe can make a wishthat out momentwill last forever.
author: Linda Dobinson
